title: Civil War Against Benjamin
summary: In response to the atrocity at Gibeah, Israel unites to punish the tribe of Benjamin. Benjamin refuses to hand over the guilty men, leading to a civil war. After major losses on both sides, Israel eventually defeats Benjamin.

faq.question: Why did Israel go to war with Benjamin?
faq.answer: Because Benjamin defended the men of Gibeah instead of handing them over for justice.

faq.question: What was the result of the war?
faq.answer: Benjamin was nearly wiped out, with only 600 men surviving.
